snippet.title: Pioner Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description:
Pioner is a Stalker-like MMO FPS where players encounter anomalies and fight to survive across haunted landscapes. A new gameplay trailer dropped during the Future Games Show Spring Showcase, noting that the game is coming to PC in 2025.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #Pioner

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
